text: hello little kiddos I am your Magical Friend baby genie Welcome to our Channel The Lion and the mouse once upon a time there lived a
lion in the forest he ruled the forest for a long time and was respected by all the animals one day after eating his meal
the lion was sleeping under a tree a little mouse saw him and found it amusing to play with him he climbed upon the sleeping lion's
head and began running up and [Music] down he climbed up the fur and danced upon the Lion's belly the lion woke up
sensing a disturbance and saw the mouse playing with him the angry lion grabbed the mouse the mouse struggled but could not escape from his huge
pu the lion opened his big jaw to swallow him the mouse was very scared oh Majesty please don't eat me forgive me
this time please let me go perhaps I can help you someday when you need me huh what you little mouse do you think
you can help the king of this jungle are you insulting my might and strength forgive me my Lord I'm a small creature who is no way equal to your
might and strength I will never ever come in front of your sight in my life [Music] again the lion laughed by hearing the
Mouse crying for its life he released the mouse from his car and looked at him with Amusement thank you Majesty you have a
big heart you gave me a chance to live you got a lucky de little mouse I just finished my lunch so I have no interest
in eating you run away from my sight but remember you should never mess with your King again if you wish to live long
hearing this terrified mouse ran away to save his life while the lion looked at the frightened Mouse running and started
laughing after few weeks the lion was searching for food in the forest the hunters in nearby Village set the trap for hunting the hunters saw the lion
approaching the Trap and were waiting for the lion to get caught as he reached nearer the hunters pulled the ropes and trapped the
lion with fear and pain lion R loudly and tried to come out of the Trap by biting it but the lion couldn't break the Rope the hunters tied the knot of
the Trap tightly on a tree to make sure that the lion does not escape from the trap later with a evil laugh they went to sleep nearby the river before
carrying the lion to the Village all the animals heard the roar but were afraid to reach the Trap and set the lion free frightened lion was
roaring continuously [Music] and suddenly he heard scratching sounds from the bushes the mouse came out of the bushes and screamed my Majesty is in
trouble I must help him out and show my gratitude he rushed toward the Trap and looked at the lion straight on face and
said please don't worry my Majesty I will cut the Trap and set you free surprised lion St stopped his cry and started watching the mouse with hope the
mouse climbed up the Trap and used his little teeth to break the
Trap the ropes in the Trap were so thick but the mouse bitten them tirelessly he broke all the ropes one by one with so
much conviction to save the lion finally he saved the lion from the trap the freed lion understood that even a little mouse can have bigger heart and
gratitude the lion said Thank You Mouse you Prov that your gratitude is bigger than everyone in this Forest it is an
honor to have you in my Forest you saved my life without expecting anything and become a true king by heart the mouse replied thank you for your
kind words my king you will always be our true king if you allow me I may leave now ah why are you going I thought we must play together daily
Hereafter surprised Mouse smiled looking at the lion and started playing with him they both played for a long time and were having fun
after a while they saw the hunters coming back after their sleep the lion and mouse started running towards them
so fast which made the hunters fear for their life the lion gave a big Roar terrified Hunters ran away to the Village from the forest and never came
back the lion and the mouse lived happy playing and helping each other in their tough situations setting an example for
friendship in the forest moral kindness and gratitude makes your friendship stronger thank you for watching this video for more videos like share and
subscribe to baby genie [Music] he
